titles.title: To require the United States Postal Service to designate a single, unique ZIP code for particular communities.
To require the United States Postal Service to designate a single, unique ZIP code for particular communities.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.

bill.summary: This bill requires the U. S. Postal Service to designate a single, unique ZIP code for each of the communities of Ocoee and Oakland, Florida.
